question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements regarding the Fundamental Rights in India?
  1. They are enforceable via court
  2. They are immune to amendment power of the parliament
  3. All of them can be suspended / abrogated in some circumstances
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: In the above question, only statement 1 is correct. The fundamental rights are not immune to amendment power of the parliament and can be amended. Similarly, some of them get suspended in some circumstances not all.
